titleStmt.title: A pastoral letter from the four Catholic bishops to the lay-Catholics of England
titleStmt.author: Leyburn, John, 1620-1702.
Giffard, Bonaventure, 1642-1734.
Smith, James, 1645-1711.
Ellis, Philip, 1652-1726.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: John Bishop of Adramite. V.A., Bonaventure Bishop of Madaura. V.A., Philip Bishop of Aureliople. V.A., James Bishop of Callipoli. V.A.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
